title: Please don't wait until season 8 for 10 bans
body: 10 bans up asap. Don't drag the wait out, then decide to postpone until preseason

replies.body: i dont understand why for competitive it was so quick and easy with 10 bans and we have to wait longer, original idea was to fix soloq with this
The problem was that the Legacy client wasn't retired yet, now that it is, they can implement it.
Correct. Path to 10 bans in regular games should be fairly quick now, barring any unforeseen issues.

Is there any concern that that 10 bans will essentially remove certain champions from the game? With 6 bans a champion with a high ban rate can usually slip through 40-50% of the time, but with 4 more bans its quite likely the frequency you are able to play these champions will go down extremely low. 

Personally im very much against 10 bans. In theory there are well over 100 champions now but considering a small percentage are 'good' at any given time due to balance combined with personal preference for champion play styles could result in few available picks.
At one point there was far fewer champions with 6 bans.  If anything it's just normalizing the ban ratio.

The interesting part about that, though, is when will 10 bans not feel like enough? Don't get me wrong, I'm all for 10 bans right now, but League is an ever growing game. Will 10 bans still feel like enough when we hit the 200th champion?

10 bans gives everyone a ban, so it feels a lot more impactful than "I hope the last two (or three) guys ban someone I don't want to see"

Given the rate of champ releases (6ish per year), I would say we won't hit 150 champs for another 2ish years and 200 some 7 years beyond that.  The game might not be around by then, or it could have altered in a variety of ways.  Either way, we don't have to worry about it for a while.
